# Avali
Avali are a species of ammonia-based intelligent bird/raptor people and due to this odd combination many refer to them as "Space Raptors" Their unique biology allows them to deal exceedingly well with the cold, and is capable of basic flight in no to low gravity environments.
## Racial Features
- Receive [color=#ffa500]40% more fire damage[/color] and [color=#1e90ff]40% less cold damage[/color]. - Can stand in tempatures of up to -50c before taking cold damage - Deal [color=red]5[/color] slashing damage with claws. - Can fly in Zero-G.
